alerts.title: The news articles, organizations, and job postings suggest a coordinated astroturf campaign targeting multiple states and issues.

alerts.title: The consistent branding and messaging of the organizations, as well as the job postings for 'Grassroots Activator' roles, indicate a centralized effort to mobilize and direct these activities.
